attributes.action: Replace the metal windows of council houses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The metal windows in council houses are very against helping global warming

they let in alot of heat and therefore our houses are very cold this winter and most of the people in council houses cant afford to have the centeral heating on to keep the house warm.

we on:  Barrowfield close, Edmonton, London, N9 0HB and the rest of the city are very cold this christmas 

we hope that the council can replace new double glazing windows, this would insulate our homes very well and they would also help the UK emitt less green house gasses
